com.netease.dagger
类 BrowserEmulator

java.lang.Object
  com.netease.dagger.BrowserEmulator

public class BrowserEmulator
extends java.lang.Object

BrowserEmulator is based on Selenium2 and adds some enhancements

构造方法摘要
BrowserEmulator()
           
 
方法摘要
 void click(java.lang.String xpath)
          Click the page element
 void enterFrame(java.lang.String xpath)
          Enter the iframe
 void expectElementExistOrNot(boolean expectExist, java.lang.String xpath, int timeout)
          Expect an element exist or not on the page
Expect element exist, but not found after timeout => Assert fail
Expect element not exist, but found after timeout => Assert fail
Here exist means visible
 void expectTextExistOrNot(boolean expectExist, java.lang.String text, int timeout)
          Expect some text exist or not on the page
Expect text exist, but not found after timeout => Assert fail
Expect text not exist, but found after timeout => Assert fail
 org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverBackedSelenium getBrowser()
          Get the WebDriverBackedSelenium instance embedded in BrowserEmulator
 org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver getBrowserCore()
          Get the WebDriver instance embedded in BrowserEmulator
 org.openqa.selenium.JavascriptExecutor getJavaScriptExecutor()
          Get the JavascriptExecutor instance embedded in BrowserEmulator
 boolean isElementPresent(java.lang.String xpath)
          Is the element present on the page
Here present means visible
 boolean isTextPresent(java.lang.String text)
          Is the text present on the page

          Switch window/tab
 void type(java.lang.String xpath, java.lang.String text)
          Type text at the page element
Before typing, try to clear existed text

方法详细信息

getBrowserCore

public org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver getBrowserCore()
Get the WebDriver instance embedded in BrowserEmulator

返回：
a WebDriver instance

getBrowser

public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverBackedSelenium getBrowser()
Get the WebDriverBackedSelenium instance embedded in BrowserEmulator

返回：
a WebDriverBackedSelenium instance

getJavaScriptExecutor

public org.openqa.selenium.JavascriptExecutor getJavaScriptExecutor()
Get the JavascriptExecutor instance embedded in BrowserEmulator

返回：
a JavascriptExecutor instance

open

public void open(java.lang.String url)
Open the URL

参数：
url - the target URL

quit

public void quit()
Quit the browser

click

public void click(java.lang.String xpath)
Click the page element

参数：
xpath - the element's xpath

type

public void type(java.lang.String xpath,
                 java.lang.String text)
Type text at the page element
Before typing, try to clear existed text

参数：
xpath - the element's xpath
text - the input text

mouseOver

public void mouseOver(java.lang.String xpath)
Hover on the page element

参数：
xpath - the element's xpath

Switch window/tab

参数：
windowTitle - the window/tab's title

enterFrame

Enter the iframe

参数：
xpath - the iframe's xpath

leaveFrame

public void leaveFrame()
Leave the iframe

refresh

public void refresh()
Refresh the browser

pressKeyboard

public void pressKeyboard(int keyCode)
Mimic system-level keyboard event

参数：
keyCode - such as KeyEvent.VK_TAB, KeyEvent.VK_F11

expectTextExistOrNot

public void expectTextExistOrNot(boolean expectExist,
                                 java.lang.String text,
                                 int timeout)
Expect some text exist or not on the page
Expect text exist, but not found after timeout => Assert fail
Expect text not exist, but found after timeout => Assert fail

参数：
expectExist - true or false
text - the expected text
timeout - timeout in millisecond

expectElementExistOrNot

public void expectElementExistOrNot(boolean expectExist,
                                    java.lang.String xpath,
                                    int timeout)
Expect an element exist or not on the page
Expect element exist, but not found after timeout => Assert fail
Expect element not exist, but found after timeout => Assert fail
Here exist means visible

参数：
expectExist - true or false
xpath - the expected element's xpath
timeout - timeout in millisecond

isTextPresent

public boolean isTextPresent(java.lang.String text)
Is the text present on the page

参数：
text - the expected text
返回：

isElementPresent

public boolean isElementPresent(java.lang.String xpath)
Is the element present on the page
Here present means visible

参数：
xpath - the expected element's xpath
返回：
